		"@import \"vendor/normalize\";\n@import \"vendor/sweetalert\";\n@import \"common/foundation/colors\";\n@import \"common/foundation/variables\";\n@import \"common/foundation/mixins\";\n@import \"common/select-kit/*\";\n@import \"common/components/svg\";\n\nbody.wizard {\n  background-color: #fff;\n  background-image: asset-url(\"/images/wizard/bubbles.png\");\n  background-repeat: repeat;\n  background-position: left top;\n  color: #444;\n  line-height: $line-height-large;\n  font-size: 15px;\n}\n\n.finish-installation {\n  .tada {\n    width: 300px;\n  }\n\n  .row {\n    text-align: center;\n    margin-bottom: 1em;\n  }\n\n  .help-text {\n    color: #999;\n  }\n}\n\n.discourse-logo {\n  background-image: asset-url(\"/images/wizard/discourse.png\");\n  height: 30px;\n  width: 110px;\n  background-size: 110px 30px;\n  background-repeat: no-repeat;\n}\n\n.wizard-warning {\n  font-family: sans-serif;\n\n  p {\n    margin-top: 0;\n  }\n\n  fieldset {\n    display: none;\n  }\n\n  h2 {\n    display: none;\n  }\n  .sa-icon {\n    display: none !important;\n  }\n}\n\n.select {\n  width: 400px;\n}\n\n.wizard-canvas {\n  position: absolute;\n  top: 0;\n  left: 0;\n  z-index: 10;\n}\n\n.staff-count {\n  font-weight: bold;\n}\n\n.wizard-step-privacy {\n  label[for=\"privacy_options\"] .field-description {\n    color: #444;\n    margin-bottom: 1em;\n  }\n\n  .field-privacy-options {\n    margin-bottom: 0.8em;\n\n    .radio-label {\n      font-weight: normal;\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n.wizard-step-form {\n  max-height: 500px;\n}\n\n.wizard-step-emoji {\n  .radio-area {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-direction: row;\n    align-items: center;\n\n    input {\n      flex: 1 0 0px;\n    }\n\n    span {\n      flex: 10 0 0;\n    }\n\n    span.extra-label {\n      flex: 20 0 0;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .emoji-preview {\n    margin-left: 1em;\n    img {\n      height: 40px;\n      width: 40px;\n      padding-right: 0.5em;\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n.wizard-step-homepage {\n  .field-homepage-style {\n    width: 280px;\n  }\n}\n\n.wizard-step-colors {\n  max-height: 465px;\n  overflow-y: auto;\n  .grid {\n    box-sizing: border-box;\n    display: flex;\n    flex-wrap: wrap;\n    justify-content: space-around;\n    padding: 0;\n    margin: 0 auto;\n    list-style-type: none;\n    text-align: center;\n\n    li {\n      display: inline-block;\n      vertical-align: top;\n      margin: 0 5px 25px 5px;\n      label:checked + div {\n        display: none;\n      }\n      .is-selected {\n        box-shadow: 0 0 0 5px $tertiary;\n      }\n      div {\n        display: flex;\n        flex: 1 1 auto;\n      }\n      .radio-area {\n        display: none;\n        & > * {\n          position: relative;\n          right: 7px;\n        }\n      }\n      canvas {\n        transition: box-shadow 0.25s;\n        &:hover {\n          box-shadow: shadow(\"card\");\n          cursor: pointer;\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n.wizard-column {\n  position: relative;\n  z-index: 11;\n  background-color: white;\n  box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);\n  box-sizing: border-box;\n  margin: 1.5em auto;\n  padding: 0;\n  max-width: 700px;\n  min-width: 280px;\n  width: 100%;\n  border: 1px solid #ccc;\n\n  .wizard-step-contents {\n    height: 550px;\n    margin-bottom: 2em;\n    a {\n      text-decoration: none;\n      color: #6699ff;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .wizard-column-contents {\n    padding: 1.2em;\n\n    h1 {\n      margin: 0 0 1em 0;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .wizard-step-description {\n    margin-bottom: 2em;\n  }\n  .wizard-step-banner {\n    margin-bottom: 2em;\n    width: 660px;\n  }\n\n  .wizard-footer {\n    border-top: 1px solid #ccc;\n    background-color: #eee;\n    padding: 0.5em;\n  }\n\n  .wizard-progress {\n    border: 1px solid #a3c1ff;\n    width: 200px;\n    height: 1.4em;\n\n    div {\n      position: absolute;\n      height: 1.4em;\n    }\n\n    .white {\n      background: white;\n      width: 200px;\n      z-index: 11;\n    }\n\n    .black {\n      background: black;\n      transition: width 0.3s;\n      z-index: 12;\n    }\n\n    span {\n      position: absolute;\n      font-size: $font-0;\n      mix-blend-mode: difference;\n      color: white;\n      z-index: 13;\n      left: 1.5em;\n    }\n\n    .screen {\n      background-color: #a3c1ff;\n      mix-blend-mode: screen;\n      width: 200px;\n      z-index: 14;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .action-link {\n    margin-right: 1em;\n    text-decoration: none;\n    color: #6699ff;\n  }\n\n  .wizard-btn {\n    border-radius: 2px;\n    font-size: $font-0;\n    border: 0;\n    padding: 0.5em;\n    transition: background-color 0.3s;\n    margin-right: 0.5em;\n    text-decoration: none;\n\n    background-color: #fff;\n    color: #333;\n    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);\n\n    &.small {\n      padding: 0.25em 0.5em;\n      font-size: $font-down-1;\n    }\n\n    &:hover,\n    &:focus {\n      background-color: #eee;\n    }\n\n    &:active {\n      background-color: #ddd;\n    }\n\n    &:disabled {\n      background-color: #ccc;\n    }\n\n    &.disabled {\n      background-color: #ccc;\n    }\n\n    .d-icon-chevron-right {\n      margin-left: 0.25em;\n      font-size: 0.8em;\n    }\n    .d-icon-chevron-left {\n      margin-right: 0.25em;\n      font-size: 0.8em;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .wizard-btn.primary {\n    background-color: #6699ff;\n    color: white;\n    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);\n\n    &:hover,\n    &:focus {\n      background-color: #80b3ff;\n    }\n\n    &:active {\n      background-color: #4d80e6;\n    }\n\n    &:disabled {\n      background-color: #000167;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .wizard-btn.danger {\n    background-color: #e60000;\n    color: white;\n\n    &:hover,\n    &:focus {\n      background-color: #cc0000;\n    }\n\n    &:active {\n      background-color: #b30000;\n    }\n\n    &:disabled {\n      background-color: #990000;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .wizard-btn-upload {\n    clear: both;\n    display: inline-block;\n    .fa {\n      margin-left: 0.5em;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .wizard-hidden-upload-field {\n    visibility: hidden;\n    position: absolute;\n  }\n\n  .wizard-step-footer {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-direction: row;\n    justify-content: space-between;\n    align-items: center;\n\n    .wizard-btn.next {\n      min-width: 70px;\n\n      .d-icon-chevron-right {\n        margin-left: 0.25em;\n        font-size: 0.8em;\n      }\n    }\n\n    .wizard-btn.back {\n      background-color: #fff;\n      color: #333;\n      box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);\n\n      &:hover,\n      &:focus {\n        background-color: #eee;\n      }\n\n      &:active {\n        background-color: #ddd;\n      }\n\n      &:disabled {\n        background-color: #ccc;\n      }\n    }\n\n    button.wizard-btn:last-child {\n      margin-right: 0;\n    }\n\n    button.wizard-btn.done,\n    button.wizard-btn.finish {\n      color: #fff;\n      background-color: #33b333;\n\n      &:hover,\n      &:focus {\n        background-color: #4dcd4d;\n      }\n\n      &:active {\n        background-color: #66e666;\n      }\n\n      &:disabled {\n        background-color: #006700;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  .wizard-image-row {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-direction: row;\n    justify-content: space-between;\n    align-items: center;\n  }\n\n  .wizard-image-preview {\n    img.field-logo-url {\n      max-height: 40px;\n    }\n    img.field-logo-small-url {\n      max-height: 40px;\n      max-width: 80px;\n    }\n    img.field-favicon-url {\n      max-height: 16px;\n      max-width: 16px;\n    }\n    img.field-apple-touch-icon-url {\n      max-height: 40px;\n      max-width: 40px;\n    }\n\n    padding: 0.1em;\n    border: 1px dotted #bbb;\n  }\n\n  .wizard-field {\n    label .label-value {\n      font-weight: bold;\n    }\n\n    .input-area {\n      margin-top: 0.5em;\n    }\n\n    .field-error-description {\n      color: red;\n      font-weight: bold;\n    }\n\n    .field-description {\n      color: #999;\n      margin-top: 0.5em;\n\n      a {\n        color: #7b68ee;\n      }\n    }\n\n    margin-bottom: 2em;\n  }\n}\n\n.wizard-step-themes-further-reading {\n  .wizard-field .input-area {\n    margin-top: 0;\n  }\n\n  .popular-themes {\n    display: flex;\n    a.popular-theme-item {\n      background: #f9f9f9;\n      padding: 8px;\n      margin: 0px 4px;\n      width: 25%;\n      &:hover,\n      &:focus {\n        background: #f3f3f3;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n.textarea-field {\n  textarea {\n    width: 100%;\n    height: 10em;\n  }\n\n  &.invalid {\n    textarea {\n      padding: 3px;\n      border: 4px solid red;\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n.text-field {\n  input {\n    width: 100%;\n    font-size: $font-up-1;\n    padding: 6px;\n    border: 1px solid #ccc;\n    transition: border-color 0.5s;\n  }\n\n  &.invalid {\n    input {\n      padding: 3px;\n      border: 4px solid red;\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n.radio-field-choice {\n  margin-bottom: 1.25em;\n\n  input {\n    /* TODO: Custom :focus style */\n    /* outline: 0;*/\n  }\n\n  .radio-label {\n    font-weight: bold;\n    margin-left: 0.5em;\n  }\n  .radio-description {\n    margin-top: 0.25em;\n    margin-left: 1.75em;\n    color: #777;\n  }\n}\n\n.invite-list {\n  .users-list {\n    margin-bottom: 1em;\n\n    .invite-list-user {\n      display: flex;\n      flex-direction: row;\n      justify-content: space-between;\n      margin-bottom: 1em;\n\n      .email {\n        width: 330px;\n      }\n\n      .role {\n        width: 200px;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  .new-user {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-direction: row;\n    justify-content: space-between;\n    align-items: center;\n    margin-bottom: 1em;\n\n    .invite-email {\n      width: 350px;\n    }\n  }\n\n  button.add-user {\n    .fa {\n      margin-right: 0.5em;\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n/* fix wizard for mobile -- iPhone 5 default width */\n@media only screen and (max-device-width: 568px) {\n  h1 {\n    font-size: $font-up-2 !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-column {\n    margin: auto !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-step-form {\n    max-height: none;\n  }\n  .wizard-step-contents {\n    height: auto !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-step-banner {\n    width: 100% !important;\n    margin-bottom: 1em !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-step-footer {\n    display: block !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-progress {\n    margin-bottom: 10px !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-buttons {\n    text-align: right !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-footer {\n    display: none !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-step-description {\n    margin-bottom: 1em !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-column-contents {\n    padding: 1em !important;\n  }\n  .wizard-step-themes-further-reading {\n    .popular-themes {\n      a.popular-theme-item {\n        width: 33.3%;\n        &:nth-child(4),\n        &:nth-child(5) {\n          display: none;\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n  .emoji-preview img {\n    width: 16px !important;\n    height: 16px !important;\n  }\n  .invite-list .new-user {\n    flex-direction: column !important;\n    align-items: inherit !important;\n  }\n  .invite-list .new-user .invite-email {\n    width: 100% !important;\n    margin-bottom: 5px !important;\n  }\n  .invite-list .add-user {\n    margin-top: 5px !important;\n  }\n\n  canvas {\n    max-width: 365px;\n  }\n\n  .wizard-step-logos,\n  .wizard-step-icons {\n    canvas {\n      max-width: 225px;\n    }\n  }\n}\n",

		".select-kit {\n  .category-row {\n    max-width: 345px;\n    .category-status {\n      display: flex;\n      align-items: center;\n      max-width: 100%;\n      -webkit-box-flex: 0;\n      -ms-flex: 1 1 auto;\n      flex: 1 1 auto;\n    }\n    .category-desc p {\n      margin: 0;\n    }\n    .category-status {\n      .badge-wrapper.box {\n        margin-bottom: 1px;\n        margin-top: 1px;\n      }\n    }\n    .topic-count {\n      white-space: nowrap;\n    }\n  }\n}\n",
		".select-kit {\n  &.dropdown-select-box {\n    &.toolbar-popup-menu-options {\n      .select-kit-body {\n        box-shadow: none;\n        padding: 0.5em 0.5em 0.25em 0.5em;\n        width: 230px;\n      }\n\n      .toolbar-popup-menu-options-heading {\n        width: 100%;\n      }\n\n      .select-kit-row {\n        margin-bottom: 0.25em;\n        padding: 0.5em 0.25em;\n        background: $primary-low;\n        transition: all 0.25s;\n\n        .texts .name,\n        .icons .d-icon {\n          font-size: $font-0;\n          font-weight: normal;\n          color: $primary;\n        }\n\n        .d-icon {\n          opacity: 0.7;\n        }\n\n        &.is-highlighted {\n          background: $primary-medium;\n\n          .name,\n          .d-icon {\n            color: $secondary;\n          }\n        }\n\n        &:hover {\n          background: $primary-medium;\n          color: $secondary;\n        }\n\n        &.is-selected {\n          color: $primary;\n          background: $primary-low;\n        }\n\n        &.is-selected.is-highlighted {\n          background: $primary-medium;\n          color: $primary;\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n",
		".select-kit {\n  &.combo-box {\n    &.color-palettes {\n      .color-palettes-row {\n        .palettes {\n          display: flex;\n          align-items: center;\n          margin-left: 0.5em;\n          flex: 1 0 0;\n\n          .palette {\n            height: 15px;\n            width: 15px;\n            display: block;\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n",
		".svg-icon,\n.svg-icon-title {\n  height: 1em;\n  width: 1em;\n  line-height: 1;\n  display: inline-flex;\n  position: relative;\n  vertical-align: -0.125em;\n  fill: currentColor;\n  flex-shrink: 0; // Prevent the icon from shrinking if it''s in a flexbox\n  overflow: visible;\n}\n\n// Fixes Edge bug with SVG elements not triggering click event\nsvg > use {\n  pointer-events: none;\n}\n\n// Stacked Icons\n// Usage:\n// <span class=\"fa-stack\">\n//    <svg class=\"... d-icon-icon1 fa-stack-1x ...\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon1\"></use></svg>\n//    <svg class=\"... d-icon-icon2 fa-stack-2x ...\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon2\"></use></svg>\n// </span>\n// -------------------------\n\n.fa-stack {\n  position: relative;\n  width: 1em;\n  height: 1em;\n  display: inline-block;\n\n  .fa-stack-1x,\n  .fa-stack-2x {\n    left: 0px;\n    top: 0px;\n    position: absolute;\n  }\n\n  .fa-stack-2x {\n    height: 1.5em;\n    width: 1.5em;\n    margin-top: -0.25em;\n    margin-left: -0.25em;\n  }\n}\n"
	],

sql_query.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM "web_hooks" INNER JOIN "web_hook_event_types_hooks" ON "web_hook_event_types_hooks"."web_hook_id" = "web_hooks"."id" INNER JOIN "web_hook_event_types" ON "web_hook_event_types"."id" = "web_hook_event_types_hooks"."web_hook_event_type_id" WHERE "web_hooks"."active" = TRUE AND (web_hooks.wildcard_web_hook = TRUE OR web_hook_event_types.name = 'tag') LIMIT 1
